page.title: 09ATTITUDES (CONTINUED)
page.content:
She is pleased with her new house and enjoys the friendly atmosphere and the sense of community there is within the area.
{Mr D.Cook}moved into Woodmancote from the London region and commutes to Gloucester every day where he works in Shire Hall in the Education Department looking after all the schools in the county.He is very interested by his work because there is so much variety in it.His daughter attends the local school and helped to compile this survey.
Everyone interviewed was happy living in the village and referred to the sense of rural calm without any feeling of isolation.
